channel.title: I can NEVER connect!
channel.description:
Okay i want to play private servers on mopar, but EVERY SERVER i try to connect to it says error connecting to server. must be down. when i run pimpscape locally it works, but only i can play. :(
Also, i made a server and a no-ip (battle-scape.servegame.com) and tried to connect to it and that didn't even work. What's going on? What server is up? Can somebody test my server to see if it is running? (Port 5555)

item.title: I can NEVER connect!
item.dc:creator: @Xcellentdriver Xcellentdriver
item.description:
@Xcellentdriver wrote:

Doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: I can NEVER connect!
item.dc:creator: @xunb3atabl3x xunb3atabl3x
item.description:
@xunb3atabl3x wrote:

hmm make sure you have right ip, port in when joining servers. if it odnt work. restart and try again. also make sure the server is online…

thats all i can really say sorry… dont know anythign else.

best of luck

Read full topic
